title: Crystal Energy (Aquapolis 146)
cleaned_text: Please remember to follow the Check the [manual of style](/wiki/Bulbapedia:Manual_of_style)and [code of conduct](/wiki/Bulbapedia:Code_of_conduct)at all times. Check the [Bulbagarden home page](https://bulbagarden.net/)for up-to-date Pokémon news and discuss it on the [forums](https://forums.bulbagarden.net/index.php)or in the [Bulbagarden Discord server](https://discord.gg/bulbagarden). Crystal [Jump to | | | | | |Provides ||Additional effect ||No | no. ||085/087 | |Japanese card no. ||039/P | Crystal Energy (Japanese: Crystal Energy) is a [Special Energy card](/wiki/Special_Energy_card_(TCG)). It was first released as part of the [Aquapolis](/wiki/Aquapolis_(TCG)) expansion. Card text e-Reader data This card has two prints. The card ID of the [Aquapolis](/wiki/Aquapolis_(TCG)) print is D-53-#. The card ID of the [P Promotional](/wiki/P_Promotional_cards_(TCG)) print is D-53. The Aquapolis print includes a short Dot Code strip for use with the [e-Reader](/wiki/E-Reader), which contains a brief card summary. There is no long strip for this print. Release information This card was included in the Aquapolis expansion with artwork by [Shin-ichi Yoshikawa](/wiki/Shin-ichi_Yoshikawa), first released in the Japanese [Wind from the Sea](/wiki/Wind_from_the_Sea_(TCG)) expansion. In Japan, it was reprinted as one of the P Promotional cards with new artwork by [Kai Ishikawa](/wiki/Kai_Ishikawa) as a gift card awarded during the 2002 Summer Battle Roads.
